capsules_submitted.utterance: So, I've always been really proud of my mixed heritage, you know? My parents were a wizard and a Muggle, which makes me a half-blood. capsules_submitted.utterance: So I've been thinking about Snape's family history and it's actually pretty interesting. He comes from a mixed wizarding background, which is quite unique.
